spells.name: Animate Plants
spells.description: One or more plants animate and fight for you.

spells.name: Changestaff
spells.description: Your staff becomes a treant on command.

spells.name: Creeping Doom
spells.description: Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.

spells.name: Heal
spells.description: Cures 10 points/level damage, all diseases and mental conditions.

spells.name: Scrying, Greater
spells.description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.description: Lets you see all things as they really are.

spells.name: Wind Walk
spells.description: You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.
